title: Drivemate
description: A platform that connects car owners with professional drivers, ensuring safe and reliable service.

title: LifeScan
description: An app providing secure access to medical records and notifying relatives in emergencies for timely medical responses.

title: Medict
description: An application designed for efficient hospital appointment scheduling, featuring a seamless booking and management.

title: Quizzy
description: An interactive quiz application that offers quizzes across multiple categories featuring timed tests and real-time results.

title: Aquisense
description: An IoT-powered system for real-time monitoring of aquarium water quality with automated fish feeding functionality.

title: Book Recommender
description: An app for exploring books by genres with personalized recommendations and user authentication.
